titles.title: National Security Innovation Act
To establish an advisory board on national security innovation activities and extend the pilot program on defense manufacturing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
National Security Innovation Act
This bill establishes an advisory board on national security innovation within the Defense Innovation Unit of the Department of Defense (DOD). It also extends through December 31, 2026, the DOD pilot program on assessing the feasibility of increasing the defense industrial base to support (1) production needs to meet military requirements, and (2) manufacturing and production of emerging defense and commercial technologies.
